org.xchain.framework.sax

Class XChainDeclFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      • org.xchain.framework.sax.XChainDeclFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader

    public class XChainDeclFilter
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
    This filter handles processing instructions. These can be used to style the contents of the xchain before it is loaded.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Jason Rose, Josh Kennedy
